quotes.quote: To reach peace, teach peace.
Reach for a better feeling thought.
You can reach higher heights by faith.
Always let your reach exceed your grasp.
We shape ourselves by our imaginative reach.
Dare to dream. Dare to reach beyond the stars.
We can't reach old age by another man's road.
Reach for the stars; you might just catch one.
The mind reaches great heights only by spurts.
No one reaches a high position without daring.
A Library goes on as far as thought can reach.
The hand cannot reach higher than does the heart.
Reach for the sky but keep your feet on the ground.
Even a snail will eventually reach its destination.
What's often in your heart is the hardest to reach.
When you reach your highest goal, choose a new one.
When you reach that deeper level, you can't go back.
When you reach the top, that's when the climb begins.
If you wish to reach the highest, begin at the lowest.
We must pass through the darkness, to reach the light.
Nothing should be out of the reach of hope. Life is a hope.
We have to embrace obstacles to reach the next stage of joy.
Everyone can reach his goal, if he can think, wait and fast.
Extend your hand with the strongest reach.
One reaches his goal by deciding to go away.
Never stop taking risks. Just keep reaching.
Reaching out takes nothing more than a smile.
Only by focusing on God can we reach our goal.
Reach with all your heart to your divine-dreams.
Know what you want and reach out eagerly for it.
